DOC.criteria: Obstructive sleep apnea syndrome patient : Inclusion criterion : Male Female age 18 year Obstructive sleep apnea syndrome apnea/hypopnea index > = 15/hour Body mass Index < 40kg/m2 Exclusion criterion : Pregnant lactate woman Participating another trial Acute infectious disease upper respiratory airway tract inclusion Complete nasal obstruction Facial neuralgia inclusion Patients able stop treatment OSA within one week visit Allergy latex Dental extraction within 15 day inclusion Pharyngeal surgery past Incapable adult Patients treat Selective Serotonin Reuptake Inhibitor Healthy Volunteers Inclusion criterion : Male Female age ≥18 ≤ 40 year No obstructive sleep apnea syndrome Body mass Index < 30kg/m2 No chronicle respiratory , neurological , cardiac able deteriorate sleep quality disease Low obstructive sleep apnea syndrome probability measure Berlin Scale Exclusion criterion : Pregnant lactate woman Participating another trial Acute infectious disease upper respiratory airway tract inclusion Complete nasal obstruction Facial neuralgia inclusion allergy latex dental extraction within 15 day inclusion pharyngeal surgery past incapable adult patient treat background treatment
